content: सर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [सरति सृ अच्] {@--1@} Going or moving. {@--2@} Cathartic, purgative --रः {@--1@} Going, motion. {@--2@} An arrow. {@--3@} The coagulum of curds or milk, cream {@--4@} Salt. {@--5@} A string, necklace; अयं कंठे बाहुः शिशिरससृणो मौक्तिकसरः <ls>U. 1. 39</ls>, <ls n="U. 1.">29.</ls> {@--6@} A waterfall. --रं {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} A lake, pool. --रा {@--1@} Motion, movement. {@--2@} A cascade. --री A water-fall.
